text:
San Francisco, Mission District - Full Stack developer, Full Time

Euclid helps physical retailers understand their customers better. We are engineers and innovators with a passion for analytics, retail, and finding needles in haystacks. Among us are the co-founder of Google Analytics, a member of ShopperTrak’s founding team, and senior executives from Ariba, TIBCO, and Reuters. We are backed by some of the world’s most prominent venture capital firms and advised by leaders in retail, technology, and privacy.

Our data analytics platform is leveling the playing field for brick and mortar retailers by providing them with the data and analytical tools to assess and re-shape their business.

We’re seeking talented, creative problem solvers to work on the full technology stack of our product.

As a Full Stack Engineer at Euclid, you will be building Rails applications and APIs, from our cloud-based databases and back-end services to our dynamic JavaScript front-end.

http://euclidanalytics.com/about/careers/
